column4: does anyone know how to get Synaptic to remove uneeded dependencies?
like when I install program X and it brings in A, B, and C. and then I remove X how do I remove the other programs?
you don't really; you can try to identify them with deborphan, which will catch a part of them
otherwise you can use debfoster, to which you can manually say what packages you've purposefully installed, and it'll act accordingly
